snippet: A United Nations report said the fate of the world’s adolescent population depended on governments’ ability to provide health care, education and jobs.
abstract: United Nations notes in report that there are more adolescents today than ever before in human history; warns that whether they lift their nations to prosperity will depend on how swiftly governments can respond to their demands for decent education, health care and jobs.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations report said the fate of the world’s adolescent population depended on governments’ ability to provide health care, education and jobs.

headline.main: Global Number of Youths Is Highest Ever, U.N. Reports
headline.print_headline: Global Population of Youths Is Highest Ever, U.N. Reports
